title: In-game Disconnection on Mac
body: Recently I've been experience in-game disconnection constantly, almost once a game. This started happening after I updated my macOS to high sierra, 10.13.1. Plz fix this.

replies.body: You've probably already done so, but let's make sure you setup your port forwarding and DNS servers again after you've updated your OS. If you aren't sure how to adjust those settings, check out the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the basics and let me know if that's able to help at all. If not, you may need to hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get some deeper troubleshooting.
